p: Fraction 12 was further chromatographed on Sephadex ® LH-20 (MeOH eluent). Fractions were collected and combined according to TLC analysis into nine main fractions (A–I). Fraction G (37.6 mg) was further purified by HPLC with MeOH/H 2O 1:1 (flow rate 1.0 mL/min) to give 3.6 mg of rosmarinic acid ( 6) (t R = 3.5 min), 1.0 mg of methyl rosmarinate ( 7) (t R = 12 min), 9.4 mg of 8-hydroxycirsimaritin ( 8) (t R = 31.5 min), 0.7 mg of thymusin ( 9) (t R = 50 min). Fraction H (7.7 mg) was separated by HPLC with MeOH/H 2O 1:1 (flow rate 1.0 mL/min) obtaining 1.1 mg of luteolin ( 10) (t R = 28.5 min) and 0.8 mg of apigenin ( 11) (t R = 48.4 min).
